Each fall, Oregon’s broadband and technology leaders gather for the Oregon Connections Telecommunications Conference—an annual event that shapes how the state connects homes, schools, and businesses to the digital economy. Now in its 29th year, the conference has grown into a statewide hub for collaboration among public agencies, internet service providers, educators, and economic development…
